Iowa_City.Roy J. and Lucille A. Carver College of: The Roy J. and Lucille A. Carver College of Medicine (a.k.a. CCOM or Carver) is the medical school of the University of Iowa, located in Iowa City, in the U.S. state of Iowa. The first medical college associated with the University of Iowa was founded in 1850, in the small town of Keokuk, Iowa, but the current Iowa City program can trace its roots to 1870.
